column3:
Eshana seeks an adventurer with a green thumb.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Use the preservative tonic on the contaminated roots of the Percipient One.
In an effort to improve relationsss with Gridania, Captain Alpa has proposed a joint initiative to revitalize the Percipient One and cleanse the sssurrounding land.
The Gridanians have offered to provide elixirs that will purify the sssoil, and we, for our part, have prepared a tonic to guard the rootsss from rot and decay.
Pray take these two vials of tonic to the Percipient One and pour them onto its rootsss.
You are returned. The deed is done, then?
Excellent. It has been many moons since we have had need of sssuch a potion. Its preservative properties allow plants to thrive in even the harshessst of conditions.
Never did I imagine it would serve to nurture the Percipient One. To return to its former glory will take time, as well as additional treatments of our tonic.
I trussst we can count on your aid when we have need of it again.
